definition: mean elevational shift including all butterfly species [m]
number of butterfly species not shifting significantly (Wilcoxon rank-sum tests)
number of butterfly species shifting close to significant (0.1 <= p > 0.05) (Wilcoxon rank-sum tests)
number of butterfly species shifting significantly (0.05 <= p > 0.01) (Wilcoxon rank-sum tests)
number of butterfly species shifting very significantly (0.01 <= p > 0.001) (Wilcoxon rank-sum tests)
number of butterfly species shifting highly significantly (0.001 <= p) (Wilcoxon rank-sum tests)
mean elevational shift only including significantly shifting butterfly species (Wilcoxon rank-sum tests) [m]
